attributes.action: Allow enable JKD to be a demonstration sport at the 2012 olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a mark to honour a Great Briton and late world champion.

rejection.details:
This is a matter for direct communication with LOCOG (www.london2012.com/locog).

E-Petitions Team
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
